actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to provide for the construction of a loop road at the Kaw Dam and Reservoir, Osage County, Okla.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to constuct a loop road approximately eight miles long at the Kaw Dam and Reservoir, Osage County, Oklahoma at an estimated cost of $740,000.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the construction of a loop road at the Kaw Dam and Reservoir, Osage County, Okla.
